      • addParent

        public void addParent(Person that)
        Add child-parent relationship between this Person and that Person, both ways. Apply any existing parental relationship between any siblings of this Person. Add parent-child relationship to any spouse of that Person.
        Parameters:
        that - The Person instance used in the operation on this Person
